T02D1385:282b-2: # // dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1385:282b-3: nyi zla 'dzin pa'i man ngag ni //
T02D1385:282b-4: zla ba dag par klu zla sbyin //
T02D1385:282b-5: de la mig gis bsgyur bar bya //
T02D1385:282b-6: zla ba'i don du gcig sbyin te //
T02D1385:282b-7: nyi ma la ni gnyis sbyin no //
T02D1385:282b-8: de la mkha' dus chus thob dor //
T02D1385:282b-9: dor rgyu med na de nyid dam //
T02D1385:282b-10: lhag ma skar mas bsgyur ba la //
T02D1385:282b-11: mkha' dus chu bos bgos thob pa //
T02D1385:282b-12: skar ma'i gnas su gzhag par bya //
T02D1385:282b-13: lhag ma drug cus bsgyur ba la //
T02D1385:282b-14: gong gi 'god byed kyis thob pa //
T02D1385:282b-15: chu tshod dag tu shes par bya //
T02D1385:282b-16: chu srang dbugs dag rim pas shes //
T02D1385:282b-17: de ltar thob pa de rnams kyis //
T02D1385:282b-18: rgyu skar rnams la sbyangs ba'i lhag / sgra gcan gdong gi skar ma yin //
T02D1385:282b-19: de dang nyi zla'i skar ma gnyis //
T02D1385:282b-20: mnyam na sgra gcan gdong gis 'dzin //
T02D1385:282b-21: mi mnyam na ni rgyu skar phyed //
T02D1385:282b-22: bsres pas sgra gcan mjug skar yin //
T02D1385:282b-23: de dang nyi zla'i skar ma gnyis //
T02D1385:282b-24: mnyam na sgra gcan mjug mas 'dzin //
T02D1385:282b-25: de yang zla ba 'dzin pa ni //
T02D1385:282b-26: sgra gcan phyed ni dag pa dang //
T02D1385:282b-27: nyi ma dag pa gnyis bsres pas //
T02D1385:282b-28: rgyu skar rdzogs sam phyed lhag dor //
T02D1385:282b-29: thig le sha rna zla ba ni //
T02D1385:282b-30: 'dzin par the tshom med pa yin //
T02D1385:282b-31: mnyam po gsum dang thig le shar //
T02D1385:282b-32: nyi ma nges par 'dzin pa yin //
T02D1385:282b-33: dus tshod ji tsam dag na 'dzin //
T02D1385:282b-34: nyin mtshan ring thung shes bya ste //
T02D1385:282b-35: gza' yi chu tshod dag dang sbyar //
T02D1385:282b-36: phyogs ni skar ma'i phyogs dang sbyor //
T02D1385:282b-37: che chung ji tsam 'dzin ba ni //
T02D1385:282b-38: gza' yi chu tshod man chad dang //
T02D1385:282b-39: skar ma'i chu tshod man chad rnams //
T02D1385:282b-40: bsres te skar mar bcas pa dang //
T02D1385:282b-41: sgra gcan skar mar bcas ba rnams //
T02D1385:282b-42: mnyam na zla ba ril po 'dzin //
T02D1385:282b-43: bco lngas gang rung mang gyur na //
T02D1385:282b-45: sum cus gang mang phyed 'dzin no //
T02D1385:282b-46: de bzhin sum cha la sogs pa //
T02D1385:282b-47: zhib tu brtsis la legs par smra //
T02D1385:283a-3: chu tshod ji tsam 'dzin pa ni //
T02D1385:283a-5: sum gnyis phyed sogs 'dzin ba ni //
T02D1385:283a-6: chu tshod bcu yi bar du 'dzin //
T02D1385:283a-7: bzhi cha la sogs chung 'dzin na //
T02D1385:283a-8: chu tshod lnga dang drug la sogs //
T02D1385:283a-9: mkhas bas brtsis la legs bar smra //
T02D1385:283a-10: spyir ni zla ba drug drug na //
T02D1385:283a-13: gal te bcu gnyis bar dag tu //
T02D1385:283a-15: zla ba nya la bzung ba yi //
T02D1385:283a-16: stong la nyi ma 'dzin yin pas //
T02D1385:283a-17: thams cad du ni brtsi bar bya //
T02D1385:283a-18: nyi ma che chung 'dzin pa rnams //
T02D1385:283a-19: thig le shar ba'i skabs su shes //
T02D1385:283a-20: de la zla ba nya dang ni //
T02D1385:283a-21: bcu drug mtshams su 'dzin pa dang //
T02D1385:283a-22: nyi ma stong dang tshes gcig gi //
T02D1385:283a-23: mtshams su 'dzin par thub pas gsungs //
T02D1385:283a-24: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsis kyi man ngag ces bya pa ;
T02D1385:283a-25: / rgya gar kha che'i pandi ta chen po //
